name: #Room
description:
Game Jam Stuck in a Loop 

By: Nathan,Matthew,Henry,Alessia,Reece 

Hallway Portal some sort of puzzle game 

Maybe even transporting something 

We have gave out tasks to each member 

Matthew:All engine work 

Alessia:Is making out game logo 

Reece:3D Modeling 

Nathan:I am doing all the research 

Henry: footsteps, ambient sound 

Games that are similar to our theme Pacman,Temple run,Subway Surfer and The Dinosaur game.

We are wanting  to make a game where you are stuck in a test chamber.The player has to solve the puzzle to escape the loop.

You will be playing as a bean.

You will be given small instructions which may not be as they see.

When we are creating this game we need to make sure that this loop is always in a cycle even if you beat the game the loops must continue for example getting teleported to the beginning but the level changes but being stuck in a loop still changes.

We are creating this game in an unreal engine and our audio is being edited into audacity.

The character design and logo is created in photoshop.

Deez nuts

What models need to be made?

Pick up able cube 

Wall with hole
